about_text:
I'm Gabriel: a future systems analyst from FIAP, an enthusiast of beautiful interfaces, and currently immersed in the world of data at Claro.

My journey began with code and automation (React, Python, UiPath), but today my professional focus is on Digital Analytics and AWS. I like to think I bridge the best of both worlds: the precision of data analysis with the aesthetic eye of someone who loves Front-end and Design.

Lifestyle: I'm that "chill nerd" who doesn't give up on an active life. If I'm not coding or analyzing metrics, I'm definitely holding a cup of coffee, training hard at the gym, or on the Muay Thai mats. I value balance, whether it's binge-watching something interesting, reading, or enjoying time with my girlfriend.

My goal? To create innovative solutions without losing lightness and commitment to constant evolution.

1.title: Furia Bot
1.description: Interactive bot developed with cutting-edge technology for immersive experiences. The project uses natural language processing and advanced automation to interact with users intelligently and contextually.

2.title: OceanSense
2.description: Ocean monitoring platform with real-time data analysis. Using IoT sensors and advanced data analysis, the system collects and processes information on ocean temperature, salinity, and pollution.

3.title: Innovate IT
3.description: Complete management system focused on sustainability and renewable energy. The platform offers resource control, sustainability metrics tracking, team management, and automated reports.

4.title: MentalAid
4.description: Mental health support application with tracking and well-being features. The system uses carefully designed UI/UX to create a welcoming and therapeutic experience.

5.title: Nexus
5.description: Unified mobile ecosystem for tech education, combining courses, real-time community, and AI.
5.fullDescription: Nexus solves the fragmentation of technical education tools by unifying learning, collaboration, and competition in a single mobile app. The platform integrates a dynamic course system (LMS), a real-time Q&A forum ideal for events like CTFs, and a competitive gamification layer. Additionally, it features an integrated AI assistant for practical cybersecurity analysis, redefining the student experience.
features: Course platform with dynamic Markdown content
Real-time forum and chat with multiple channels
Gamification with smart Quiz and competitive global Ranking
Integrated AI assistant (Gemini) for cybersecurity analysis

6.title: MentalBalance
6.description: B2B mobile app for mental health monitoring and burnout prevention
6.fullDescription: Mobile app (React Native) focused on corporate well-being and burnout prevention. Uses artificial intelligence and device sensors to monitor stress signals, offering multimodal check-ins (voice and text), sentiment analysis via AI (Gemini), and guided breathing exercises. Includes anonymous dashboards for team management, promoting a healthier work environment.
features: Daily check-in with sentiment analysis via AI (Gemini)
Team dashboard with anonymized data for managers

education.description: Degree focused on systems development and technology

experiences.description: Currently working with AWS, Google Analytics, and Tag Manager, but during this internship, I will delve into various areas such as agility, CRO, and design.
Worked with UiPath automations, had extensive contact with SAP and Excel in general.

courses.title: Amazon AWS
courses.description: AWS basics, cloud computing, and Lambda

hardskills: Languages: Python, SQL, VBA, JavaScript, C# (actively learning)
Tools and Visualization: Excel (advanced), Power BI, Looker Studio
Automation and RPA: UiPath, Python scripts for operational tasks

awards.subtitle: Achievements and recognitions throughout my journey in technology

1.title: GlobalSolution 2024/1
1.description: I won the GlobalSolution 2024/1 award with the Ocean Sense project, which focuses on creating innovative solutions for monitoring and protecting the oceans. This award recognized my contribution to environmental preservation by applying technology to solve global environmental challenges.

2.title: FIAP Next 2024
2.description: I achieved first place at FIAP Next 2024, receiving the Best Project award. My group was recognized for developing the Innovate IT project, a management solution for small businesses focused on usability and efficiency.

frontend.title: Front-End Development
frontend.desc: React, Python, JavaScript, SQL, and UiPath automations

uiux.title: UI/UX Design
uiux.desc: Creating intuitive interfaces and memorable experiences
